titles: A proclamation, continuing the adjournment of the current Parliament, from the first Thursday of April next, to the twenty ninth of that moneth, 1686.
author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Scotland. Sovereign (1685-1688 : James VII)
publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, Printer to his most sacred Majesty,
notes: Royal arms at head of text; initial letter.
Dated at end: Given under Our Signet at Edinburgh, the twentieth two day of March, 1686. And of Our Reign the second year.
Signed: Colin McKenzie Cls. Sti. Concilii.
Imperfect: stained with slight loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
keywords: Scotland --  Politics and government --  1660-1688 --  Early works to 1800.
